features: 💘【Crystal Clear Audio and Video】: It's a baby monitor with camera and audio, which delivers real-time video and clear audio of your baby. With exceptional image quality, you can see every detail and hear every sound, ensuring you never miss a moment of your little one.

💘【Secure and Private Connection】: No need for Wi-Fi or app pairing. This baby camera utilizes the latest 2.4GHz FHSS technology, providing a stable and secure connection. Rest assured that your baby's privacy is protected, as this technology ensures hacker-free connectivity.

💘【Smart ECO Mode】: This baby monitor camera comes with a convenient eco mode. When you activate it, the monitor's screen goes to sleep to save battery, but it instantly wakes up when it detects any sound from your baby. This means you don't have to keep staring at the screen all the time.

💘【Automatic Night Vision】: This video baby monitor also features night vision capabilities. The night vision feature ensures that parents can keep an eye on their baby throughout the night, providing a sense of reassurance and security.
💘【Easy to Set up】: Easy to use, plug and play, simple and lightweight. It's a portable baby monitor, and you can take it anywhere easily. Any questions you have, feel free to contact.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Protect Your Privacy, Safe and Sound. We use FHSS technology, which transmits through a secure internal 2.4GHz channel, in all of our baby camera monitors. You can rest easy knowing that you and your baby are protected from any unwanted eyes. We prioritize your peace of mind above all else.

VTimes Baby Monitor: Professional, Peace of Mind For over 20 years, we have focused on Specializing in the production of baby camera, which integrate design, research and development, production, and service. We are committed to providing better products and services. If you have any problem, feel free to tell us. We are always here to help. Smart Features 1. Clear Image 2. VOX Mode 3. No WiFi, No Apps 4. Plug and Play 5. Feeding Reminder 6. Pan-Tilt-Zoom 7. Up to 1000ft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Video is clear in daylight and night vision, audio is loud and clear. Large screen that can zoom in. Long lasting battery for monitor screen. I like the sound indication lights so I don’t have to have the volume up all the time. Just wish there was an option to buy a second camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional baby monitor for a good price
reviews.reviewText: We got this for our newborn, and while I thought the camera looked like a little higher quality than it was in real life, the whole system works as advertised. For the price, this is a good buy as it works to monitor the baby and make it so we know when they wake up. It has a VOX setting that turns off the screen and sound so that you can sleep with it at night; while I like the feature, it doesn’t work real well with having a white noise machine because the white noise keeps it on at the first two levels, and on the highest level it turns on and off too much. The monitor part is nice, it has a good battery life and you can take it around the house with you as needed. Overall, because it was as cheap as it is, I would recommend this for anyone looking for a cheap baby monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good but has glitches
reviews.reviewText: This product does the job. The glitches I’ve experienced and it honestly could be a defect for my unit but the picture goes out, and sound goes off at random times for about 5-10 seconds at a time. The screen will turn blue on one side and have an image on the other.However the sound/volume is great. The picture is clear enough for a camera. It’s not hi-def but it’s cheap so…the fact that I can black to screen and still have it on is a plus for night time since I don’t like additional light at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great camera, super easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Love the quality. For a baby monitor, it’s great. I can see him breathing as his chest moves, so you know it’s good enough resolution for that. Superb audio pickup. I can hear every little coo and noise the little guy makes, even his breathing! It’s super easy to setup, just plug the camera in somewhere and the monitor connects right to it. No apps, no WiFi. The 2-way audio works good as well. Took me a while to realize this, but you can mount the camera stand to a wall and get more viewing angles. Just TWO things I wish were different; the standard view seems zoomed in already. I know I’m not on the 2x zoom mode. It’s just how to camera is. Also, the battery life on the monitor could be improved. Not so sure about the 19 hour lifespan they say it has.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Secure, Sensitive, and Affordable Baby Monitor!
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough good things about this baby monitor! It's everything I was looking for, and here are a few highlights that make it stand out1. Closed Loop System for Enhanced Security: One of the standout features of this baby monitor is that it's a closed loop system, which means it's not connected to Wi-Fi. This provides peace of mind knowing that there's no chance of hackers accessing your baby monitor feed. In a world filled with security concerns, having a baby monitor that prioritizes safety is a huge plus.2. Microphone Sensitivity: The sensitivity of the microphone on this monitor is incredible. It picks up even the slightest sounds, allowing me to hear my baby's every breath and whimper during the night. This feature has been a game-changer for us, especially for monitoring our baby's well-being.3. Impressive Battery Life and Affordable Price: The battery life of this monitor is exceptional. I can go for hours without worrying about it dying on me, giving me the flexibility to move around the house while keeping an ear on my little one. Plus, the price is fantastic for the quality you get. It's a budget-friendly option that doesn't compromise on performance.Overall, this baby monitor has exceeded my expectations. It provides top-notch security, superb microphone sensitivity, long-lasting battery life, all at an affordable price. I highly recommend it to any parent looking for a reliable and worry-free way to keep an eye on their baby. It's been a lifesaver for me, and I couldn't be happier with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable for the price
reviews.reviewText: Im on my third kiddo so I've been through various monitors. My baby's room is far away from my internet router making the fancier wifi monitors unreliable. I purchased one of those when he was born for a few hundred dollars. It had constant connection issues. This simple monitor always works and gives piece of mind. It's no frills, but for the price...gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Had a newborn and needed a monitor, got this to try since I didn’t want to go with WiFi. Guess I was wrong should have just buy a wyze pan cam v3 which is better. This thing isn’t very clear the image you’re seeing is a stock image. The video feeds is rather strong which was impressive. The mic and voice is lacking. The temperature is never accurate. It does coke with a mount so that good I think but some 3m double sided would work too.The lcd screen isn’t viewing friendly. You have to look directly at it otherwise it’s all distorted. The volume on it is horrible. The battery take a long time to charge I left it over night more than 8 hours for it to be completely full. Only use it for 30 minutes and it already lost a bar.The camera viewing angle is minimalistic, mic is horrible, speaker is meh. It does rotate and move up and down easily. Once set you forget it. Auto it doesn’t really do a good job of monitoring because my baby was moving and whining and it didn’t even pick it up. I’ve mounted it like 5ft away with direct line of sight to my baby. Night vision is garbage as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera and sound in a small package
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful baby monitor that is used to keep an eye on my 89 year old father. Very user friendly and the night mode has terrific clarity.
Really happy with our purchase. The sound and video quality is wonderful and the battery lasts a long time. Convenient that it doesn’t need wifi!

No se me envió el modelo que muestran en la publicación, esto no seria problema, pero la pantalla no se activa aun si hay ruido fuerte, casi casi se activa completamente al azar. No es posible configurarlo para tenerlo siempre encendido. El proceso de reclamo y devolución es horrible. El envió va por tu lado y las etiquetas que te generan no contiene bien la dirección. Definitivamente un desperdicio de dinero.

It is really good for the price. We’ve been using for a few months now and the battery is great, it lasts the entire night and more (at least for now)All the features and image quality were great, even the night mode.Would recommend

El hecho que ahorre el encendido de pantalla solo a según si llora el bebé no es práctico ya que si se da la vuelta y queda en mala posición no te das cuenta, aún el efecto de que enciende si llora no es adecuado ya que varias veces ha estado llorando y me doy cuenta porq escucho por la puerta ya que la pantalla jamas se encendió, si pudiera lo regresaba

reviews.reviewTitle: Charger Stopped Working after a couple months
reviews.reviewText: Liked this camera but the charger for the monitor stopped working so I will likely have to buy a complete new monitorSeller refunded me for the item.
